story_text: Nina the ninja loves to nap under the big, nutty pine tree.
One sunny morning, she noticed Nancy the rabbit nibbling on a nut nearby.
story_images: A ninja girl named Nina is happily napping under a large pine tree with lots of nuts around.
A cute rabbit named Nancy is nibbling on a nut under the sun, with Nina observing from her spot.

questions.question: Where does Nina love to nap?
What was Nancy the rabbit doing?
